text: Alliance Française de Chittagong or AFC is a nonprofit organization in Chattogram, Bangladesh, which has been working since 1965. AFC celebrated the 50th anniversary of its activities in Chattogram in 2015. Sometimes referred as the French Cultural Center, Alliance Française de Chittagong is a prestigious institution focusing on the promotion of the French and World cultures and the teaching of French language and works independently in close liaison with the High Commission of France in Bangladesh. ==Location== It is located at 123 K.B. Fazlul Kader Road, near CMC, Chawkbazar in Chittagong city. ==References== == External links == * Category:1965 establishments in Pakistan Category:Educational institutions established in 1965 Category:Schools in Chittagong Category:Bangladesh–France relations Category:Alliance Française
title: Alliance Française de Chittagong
